steps.title: Romance your long-distance lover with a heartfelt quote.
steps.content: Romance your long-distance lover with a heartfelt quote. Long-distance relationships can be challenging to deal with, so it’s all the more important to keep the spark alive with romantic messages and gestures. If you want to make sure that your partner doesn’t go a minute without knowing how much you love them, send them one of these relationship quotes that come from the heart: [1] X Research source “Distance means so little, when someone means so much.” – Tom McNeal “Love will travel as far as you let it. It has no limits.” – Dee King “Can miles truly separate you from friends… If you want to be with someone you love, aren’t you already there?” – Richard Bach “I exist in two places, here, and where you are.” – Margaret Atwood “Love isn’t finding someone to live with. It’s finding someone you can’t live without.” – Unknown “It’s true- we don’t have it as easy as ordinary couples, but this is no ordinary love.” – Unknown “The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.” – Helen Keller “Distance isn’t a reason to end a relationship but an opportunity to make a connection stronger.” – Unknown “I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart).” – E.E. Cummings “Being close is the first and last desire of lovers, but being far and loving each other without an inch’s difference is the characteristic of real love.” – Senora Roy “My heart is your home, wherever in the world you are – you will always have a place to stay.” – K.A. Hill “I may not always be with you. But when we’re far apart. Remember you will be with me. Right inside my heart.” – Marc Wambolt “Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.” – Benjamin Franklin “Ocean separates lands, not souls.” – Munia Khan “Love reckons hours for months, and days for years; and every little absence is an age.” – John Dryden “In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.” – Virginia Woolf “That’s how you know you love someone, I guess, when you can’t experience anything without wishing the other person were there to see it, too.” – Kaui Hart Hemmings “He stepped down, trying not to look long at her, as if she were the sun, yet he saw her, like the sun, even without looking.” ― Leo Tolstoy

steps.title: Fill them with butterflies (from afar!) with a sweet love quote.
steps.content: Fill them with butterflies (from afar!) with a sweet love quote. Is your long-distance S.O. the sweetest thing in your life? Then they surely deserve a romantic quote that’s just as sweet and adorable as they are. A light-hearted but meaningful quote will get your feelings across while still making your love giggle, blush, and kick their feet from all those miles away. Here are some of our favorites: [2] X Research source “How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.” – A.A. Milne “I like the way you make me feel, even when you’re nowhere near.” – Unknown “If ever there is tomorrow when we’re not together… there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we’re apart… I’ll always be with you.” – A.A. Milne “I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time.” – A.A. Milne “I follow the signs right back to you. I know they wind right back to you.” – Twin Forks “Whether you’re by my side or a plane ride away, having you in my life has made me a better person.” – Anonymous “I love you past the moon and miss you beyond the stars.” – J.M. Storm “Flash forward and we’re taking on the world together, and there’s a drawer of my things at your place.” – Taylor Swift “May the moon kiss you to sleep until I can.” – Anonymous “I'm only one call away, I'll be there to save the day. Superman got nothing on me.” – Charlie Puth “I just wanted you to know you were missed.” – Megan Erickson “How strange to dream of you even when I am wide awake.” – David Jones “They say that home is where the heart is, but that’s not where mine lives.” – Taylor Swift “And I will wait, I will wait for you.” – Mumford & Sons “Well, it's a windin' road when you're in the lost and found. You're a lover, I'm a runner and we go 'round and 'round. And I love you but I leave ya, I don't want you but I need ya. You know it's you that calls me back here, baby.” – Zac Brown Band “If I could fall into the sky, do you think time would pass me by? 'Cause you know I'd walk a thousand miles if I could just see you tonight.” – Vanessa Carlton “I’m here without you, baby, but you’re still on my lonely mind. I think about you, baby, and I dream about you all the time.” – 3 Doors Down “We'll meet beyond the shore, we'll kiss just like before. Happy we'll be beyond the sea, and never again, I'll go sailing.” – Jack Lawrence

steps.title: Express the profoundness of your love with a deep long-distance quote.
steps.content: Express the profoundness of your love with a deep long-distance quote. Absence makes the heart grow fonder, and a long-distance relationship can often result in heart-wrenching, emotional feelings of love. These intensely stirring sentiments need to be expressed somehow, and one of the deep and beautiful quotes below can definitely get that job done: [3] X Research source “The longest absence is less perilous to love than the terrible trials of incessant proximity.” – Edna St. Vincent Millay “Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.” – Gilbert Parker “Years from now, our past will be a story – a story of long days and lonely nights, hard work and lack of sleep. We’ll live each day having intimately known the pain of being apart. We’ll appreciate our time together, knowing how lucky we are to have made it through and we’ll find solace in the promise of a future together.” – Unknown “Distance is not for the fearful, it is for the bold. It is for those willing to spend a lot of time alone in exchange for a little time with the one they love. It is for knowing a good thing when they see it, even if they don’t see it nearly enough.” – Unknown “When they work, long distance are the best sort of relationships, I think. That a person could wait months, cross miles and oceans for a few spectacular moments with the person they love, that’s it, you know, that’s all that we’re searching for.” – Beau Taplin “In true love, the smallest distance is too great and the greatest distance can always be bridged.” – Unknown “When your absence is felt, your presence is the essence and it makes a difference.” – Michael Bassey Johnson “And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.” – Khalil Gibran “Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and fans the bonfire.” – François Duc de la Rochefoucauld “The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.” – Nicholas Sparks “When two souls are one, they hear each other, even in silence.” – Matshona Dhliwayo “Love is that orbit of the restless soul, whose circle grazes the confines of space, bounding within the limits of its race, utmost extremes.” – George Henry Boker “And one by one the nights between our separated cities are joined to the night that unites us.” – Pablo Neruda “Where we love is home—home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.” – Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr. “For time is the longest distance between two places.” – Tennessee Williams “Distance unites missing beats of two hearts in love.” – Munia Khan “I don’t know what they are called, the spaces between seconds—but I think of you always in those intervals.” – Salvador Plascencia “Love is space and time measured by the heart.” – Marcel Proust

steps.title: Let it all out with a sorrowful quote about love and distance.
steps.content: Let it all out with a sorrowful quote about love and distance. Long-distance relationships still manage to be filled with love and joy, and they can definitely be successful in the long run! However, not having your significant other by your side can definitely increase feelings of sadness and loneliness. So, if you’re missing your long-distance partner (even more than usual), send them one of these melancholic but romantic quotes: [4] X Research source “So I wait for you like a lonely house. Till you will see me again and live in me. Till then my windows ache.” – Pablo Neruda “If you cannot hold me in your arms, then hold my memory in high regard. And if I cannot be in your life, then at least let me live in your heart.” – Ranata Suzuki “In this California king bed, we're ten thousand miles apart. I've been California wishing on these stars for your heart, for me, my California king.” – Rihanna “I found that I missed him the more he was absent from my life, and the more I missed him, the more I loved him.” – Donna Lynn Hope “Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.” – Emily Dickinson “So I'll watch your life in pictures like I used to watch you sleep.” – Taylor Swift “I told myself ‘Don’t get attached,’ but in my mind I play it back, spinning faster than the plane that took you.” – Taylor Swift “Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.” – Alphonse de Lamartine “The smell of your skin lingers on me now. You're probably on your flight back to your hometown. I need some shelter of my own protection, baby. Be with myself and center clarity, peace, serenity.” – Fergie “I felt like I was leaving a piece of my soul behind the moment you left. And every second that passes, I miss you like that, times a million.” – J.A. Huss “I miss you, like every day. Wanna be with you, but you're away.” – Beyoncé “And when the daylight comes I'll have to go, but tonight I'm gonna hold you so close. 'Cause in the daylight we'll be on our own, but tonight I need to hold you so close.” – Maroon 5 “I miss you deeply, unfathomably, senselessly, terribly.” – Franz Kafka “I have died every day waiting for you. Darling, don't be afraid, I have loved you for a thousand years. I'll love you for a thousand more.” – Christina Perri “We’ll meet again, but you’re a lifetime away, and I need you now.” – Karen Quan “Nothing makes a room feel emptier than wanting someone in it.” – Calla Quinn “Saying goodbye is death by a thousand cuts.” – Taylor Swift “I wake to you everywhere. Yet you are not here.” – Nayyirah Waheed “You’re everywhere except right here and it hurts.” – Rupi Kaur “I can’t forget you, I try all the time. I can’t forget you, Berlin, with your hand in mine.” – Bear’s Den

steps.title: Remember the happy ending that awaits you with an inspirational quote.
steps.content: Remember the happy ending that awaits you with an inspirational quote. To get through a long-distance relationship, it’s important to keep reminding yourself (and your partner) of what you’re doing it all for. One way to keep that message at the forefront of your minds is to share motivational quotes about the strength and perseverance of true love—no matter the distance. Here are some inspirational options to start with: [5] X Research source “The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.” – Charles Dickens “I don’t cry because we’ve been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we’re still together.” – Donna Lynn Hope “Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it inflames the great.” – Roger De Bussy-Rabutin “I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.” – Steve Maraboli “Sometimes you have to be apart from people you love, but that doesn’t make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.” – Nicholas Sparks “The art of love is largely the art of persistence.” – Albert Ellis “My soul will find yours.” – Jude Deveraux “Once trust is built, distance cannot kill it. Time and space alone cannot destroy authentic connection.” – Vironika Tugaleva “You don’t develop courage by being happy in your relationships every day. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.” – Barbara De Angelis “There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.” – Mahatma Gandhi “Love knows no distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.” – Gilbert Parker “If you found that one person who is really worth the sacrifices, pain, and hardships, then your efforts will not go to waste.” – Anna Agoncillo “We only part to meet again.” – John Gay “I can see us in a house next year, you’ll be making your mind up, you can figure out what goes where.” – Rex Orange County “I’m not telling you it’s going to be easy—I’m telling you it’s going to be worth it.” – Art Williams “Love has no age, no limit; and no death.” – John Galsworthy “Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.” – Maya Angelou “Absence makes the heart grow fonder.” – Charles M. Schulz

steps.title: Recognize how far your relationship has come with a celebratory quote.
steps.content: Recognize how far your relationship has come with a celebratory quote. If you’ve hit a milestone in your long-distance relationship—whether it’s one week, one month, or one year—it’s certainly worth celebrating! It takes a lot of time, energy, and emotional commitment to make a long distance relationship work, so you and your partner deserve to recognize all of the love you’ve created with one of these celebratory quotes: [6] X Research source “They sit together, physically separate but utterly connected by the moment they’ve created” – Stan Lee “My dear, I think of you always and at night I build myself a warm nest of things I remember and float in your sweetness till morning.” – Zelda Fitzgerald “What would not I give to wander, where my old companions dwell, absence makes the heart grow fonder, Isle of Beauty, fare thee well!” – Thomas Haynes Bayly “For the two of us, home isn’t a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.” – Stephanie Perkins “Love is not finding someone to live with. It’s finding someone you can’t live without.” – Rafael Ortiz “I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.” – Elizabeth Barrett Browning “Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.” – Antoine de Saint-Exupery “If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.” – Alfred Tennyson “Distance between two people is inconsequential when their souls are united.” – Matshona Dhliwayo I wish I could show you, when you are lonely or in darkness, the astonishing light of your own being.” – Hafiz “I’ll hold you in my heart, until I can hold you in my arms.” – J.M. Barrie “Salute to me, I’m your American Queen and you move to me like I’m a Motown beat and we rule the kingdom inside my room.” – Taylor Swift “While I sleep, I dream of you, and when I wake, I long to hold you in my arms. If anything, our time apart has only made me more certain that I want to spend my nights by your side, and my days with your heart.” – Nicholas Sparks “Your absence has not taught me how to be alone; it has merely shown me that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.” – Doug Fetherling “I've been thinking 'bout you. Do you think about me still? Do ya, do ya? Or do you not think so far ahead? ‘Cause I been thinking bout forever.” – Frank Ocean “Watching the world from the sidelines, had nothing to prove. 'Til you came into my life and gave me something to lose.” – Phoebe Bridgers “For when the cold winds blow, I will close my eyes calmly knowing I am anchored to you.” – Tyler Knott Gregson “The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.” – Audrey Hepburn

steps.title: Use a funny long-distance quote to keep your love story full of laughs.
steps.content: Use a funny long-distance quote to keep your love story full of laughs. The long-distance blues getting you down? Cheer up your partner and strengthen your bond with a fun or flirty message. After all, humor is often cited as one of the most important characteristics in healthy relationships…and this includes long-distance relationships! Telepathically tickle your S.O.’s funny bone with one of these humorous quotes: [7] X Research source “I will love you until the chances of us running into one another slip from slim to zero, and until your face is fogged by distant memory, and your memory faced by distant fog, and your fog memorized by a distant face, and your distance distanced by the memorized memory of a foggy fog.” – Lemony Snicket “I want to be with you. It’s as simple and as complicated as that.” – Charles Bukowski “You are never alone on Valentine’s Day if you’re near a lake and have bread.” – Mike Primavera “I always joke and laugh when people ask me what’s the key to my long marriage and lasting love. I always say ‘Stay gone!’ and there’s a lot of truth to that.” – Dolly Parton “She missed him. She missed him so much that she was starting to hate him.” – Talia Hibbert “Definition of a long-distance relationship: ‘Inconveniently the most effective way to find out if you really love each other.’” – Anonymous “I would walk 500 miles and I would walk 500 more just to be the man who walks a thousand miles to fall down at your door.” “If need be, you can live in my heart…rent free…all utilities included.” – Unknown “Poets use countless words to describe their pain, but I only need three: I miss you.” – Caroline George “They said: ‘Write the longest sentence you know.’ I wrote: ‘A life without you.’” – Unknown “If I miss you any harder, my heart might come looking for you.” – Gemma Troy “It is a risk to love. What if it doesn’t work out? Ah, but what if it does.” – Peter McWilliams “Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.” – Truman Capote “Being in a long-distance relationship is like being in school all over again: Distance teaches us to appreciate the days that we get to spend together and how to define patience. It reminds us that every moment together is special, and every second together should be cherished… And just like when I was in school, I’d rather skip class and kiss you in the stairwell.” – Lisa McKay “Look, in my opinion, the best thing you can do is find a person who loves you for exactly what you are. Good mood, bad mood, ugly, pretty, handsome, what have you. The right person is still going to think the sun shines out of your ass. That's the kind of person that's worth sticking with.” – Juno “I would build a teleporter, if I could, just to sleep next to you tonight.” – Unknown “I am in my bed. You are in your bed. One of us is in the wrong place.” – Unknown “If I had to pay for every moment I miss you, I’d be broke.” – Unknown

steps.title: Send him a heart-touching quote to feel closer despite the distance.
steps.content: Send him a heart-touching quote to feel closer despite the distance. If your boo is far too far away from you, then you should still make a daily effort to make him feel special and loved. Choose a romantic quote that specifically appeals to his sense of humor, personality, and love language—starting from the options listed here: [8] X Research source “This is the sad bed of chosen chastity because you are miles and mountains away.” – Erica Jong “Ah, but a man’s reach should exceed his grasp, or what’s a heaven for?” – Robert Browning “How is it that he’s always in my thoughts even when I am not thinking?” – Sanober Khan “You know it’s true love when no matter how far the distance is, he can still make you smile." – Anonymous “I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him.” – Jodi Picoult “I hear it in your voice—you’re smoking with your boys. I touch my phone as if it’s your face.” –Taylor Swift “I still can't believe that you noticed me an ocean away. The heavens would say it was meant to be.” – Laufey “She knew she loved him when 'home' went from being a place to being a person.” – E. Leventhal “As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.” – John Green “Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.” – Emily Brontë “I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.” – Notting Hill “You are my greatest adventure.” – The Incredibles “To me, you are perfect.” – Love Actually “It’s like in that moment, the whole universe existed just to bring us together.” – Serendipity “True love stories never have endings.” – Richard Bach “I promise to love you forever. Every single day of forever.” – Stephenie Meyer “But you’ve slipped under my skin, invaded my blood and seized my heart.” – Maria V. Snyder “We loved with a love that was more than love.” – Edgar Allan Poe

steps.title: Remind her of just how special she is with a long-distance love quote.
steps.content: Remind her of just how special she is with a long-distance love quote. Your girl is probably your moon and your stars…but it’s a bummer if she also feels a universe away from you. However, you can still make your girlfriend or wife feel adored in a long-distance relationship by sending her frequent declarations of love—like one of these romantic quotes for her: [9] X Research source “The simple lack of her is more to me than others presence.” – Edward Thomas “She is the one in my heart and I’m zero without her. When the world tries to divide her from me, that’s where our love becomes infinite.” – Nanruth Nanda “She affected me, even when she was absent.” – Shannon A. Thompson “I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart.” – Nicholas Sparks “I must admit, I miss you quite terribly. The world is too quiet without you nearby.” – Lemony Snicket “Distance sometimes lets you know who is worth keeping, and who is worth letting go.” – Lana Del Rey “It's just another night, and I'm staring at the moon. I saw a shooting star and thought of you. I sang a lullaby by the waterside and knew if you were here, I'd sing to you.” – Ed Sheeran “Being apart ain’t easy on this love affair—two strangers learn to fall in love again. I get the joy of rediscovering you, oh girl, you stand by me. I’m forever yours, faithfully.” – Journey "I'm a thousand miles away, but, girl, tonight you look so pretty, yes, you do. Times Square can't shine as bright as you, I swear, it's true." – Plain White T’s "When they ask me what I liked the best, I'll tell them, it was you." – City of Angels "I can hear her heartbeat for a thousand miles, and the heavens open every time she smiles." – Van Morrison “He stepped down, trying not to look long at her, as if she were the sun, yet he saw her, like the sun, even without looking." – Leo Tolstoy “She is the only evidence of God I have seen with the exception of the mysterious force that removes one sock from the dryer every time I do my laundry." – St. Elmo’s Fire “Yes, I'm drunk. And you're beautiful. And tomorrow morning, I'll be sober but you'll still be beautiful." – The Dreamers “You're so beautiful, you could be a waitress. You're so beautiful, you could be an air hostess in the '60s. You're so beautiful, you could be a part-time model.” – Flight of the Conchords “She wasn't doing a thing that I could see, except standing there leaning on the balcony railing, holding the universe together.” – J.D. Salinger “Love her but leave her wild.” – Atticus “And in her smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.” – Beth Revis

steps.title: Spice up your daily long-distance messages with a romantic text.
steps.content: Spice up your daily long-distance messages with a romantic text. For better or for worse, texting is a big part of long-distance relationships. Whether you’re sending daily good morning messages or lengthy love paragraphs, expressing your love verbally (or textually) can go a long way in keeping a long distance relationship strong. If you’re looking for something new and fresh, try shooting off one of these romantic texts to your long-distance lover (and don’t forget the emojis!): [10] X Research source I wish you were here 📍 Together, we can weather any storm ⛈️ Sending all my love from miles away 💌 The future is ours, no matter the miles 🌌 In every sunset, I see you there with me 🌇 Distance makes the heart grow fonder 🌱💖 Distance is just a small blip in our journey 🚀 Your love is my favorite destination, no matter where I am 💕✈️ Love you more than the stars in the sky 🌟 You complete my world in ways I never imagined 🌍♥️🫵🏻 I don’t need to be with you to know you’re my everything 💘 You’re far, but not far enough to escape my mid-day meltdowns 😘 Love knows no distance…it only knows it’s tired of buying plane tickets 😆 Who needs date night when you can freeze mid-sentence on FaceTime? 🤣 Jealous of people who get to see your face every day 😝 Missing you is my least favorite hobby 🥲 It’s love that makes the missing so painful ❤️‍🩹 I never knew missing someone could feel like this 🥺💔

steps.title: Use a romantic caption to show off your long distance love online.
steps.content: Use a romantic caption to show off your long distance love online. You may not get to see each other all that often, but whatever in-person couple pics you do have definitely deserve a spot on the ‘gram. Polish off your perfect post with the perfect long-distance caption to match your relationship—whether you’re an ooey-gooey duo, a clever couple, or a poetic pair: [11] X Research source “You know I left a part of me back in New York.” – Taylor Swift “Debí tirar más fotos de cuando te tuve.” – Bad Bunny (Translation: “I should’ve taken more photos when I had you.”) “If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.” – Oscar Wilde "If you fall I will catch you, I'll be waiting...time after time." – Cyndi Lauper “I want you forever, not just for tonight.” – Sylvain Reynard The only good thing about being apart is that I always have something beautiful to look forward to ✨ Wherever you are, I’m there too 👩🏻‍❤️‍👨🏻 Love at first flight 💕✈️ Our relationship has more flight miles than I do 😂✈️ Our love story is written across the miles 🛤️ Feeling butterflies from the other side of the world 🦋 My heart clings to your memory 💝 I’d trade hours for minutes with you ⌛ Distance is hard, but loving you is easy 🥹 Distance isn't an issue because in the end, I have you 🥰 Us 🤝 late night calls An unbreakable bond 🔗 Syncing hearts across time zones 💞

steps.title: Send your partner a bracelet or necklace that lets them feel your touch.
steps.content: Send your partner a bracelet or necklace that lets them feel your touch. Gift your partner with a touch bracelet (and keep the other one for yourself) to feel connected from any part of the world. When both of you are wearing your bracelets, either of you can simply touch your device to send a special vibration to your sweetheart’s matching band. With Bond Touch bracelets , you can even program your bracelets with your own touch language—maybe two taps means “I love you” and three means “I miss you!” If bracelets aren’t your thing, then you can get an equally sleek and stylish necklace that also provides a feeling of emotional closeness with your loved one. The Bond Touch heart necklace allows you to record and store your S.O.’s heartbeat into the device. When you wear it around your neck, you can hold the pendant in your hand to feel the pulse of your partner’s heartbeat—no matter where they are. If you already have an Apple Watch, you can actually get some of these features without purchasing any new products! Just download the Bond Touch Lite app , which gives you access to most of the Bond Touch features through your smart watch.

steps.title: Customize location-based keepsakes with maps or coordinates.
steps.content: Customize location-based keepsakes with maps or coordinates. Many popular gifts for long-distance relationships will nod to the two places that you and your S.O. call home (besides each other’s hearts, of course!). Consider customizing embroidered sweatshirts, engraved necklaces, or printed keychains with your respective city coordinates. Or, order a handmade keepsake candle with a label that features both of your home cities, states, or countries. [12] X Research source You can also create customized map art that aesthetically arranges map images of your different locations into a heart or another custom pattern. If you and your partner live in totally different time zones, send them a two-part clock or watch with dual faces that can be programmed to simultaneously show both of your local times!

steps.title: Send care packages or gift boxes through online delivery companies.
steps.content: Send care packages or gift boxes through online delivery companies. There are countless online companies, vendors, and artisans that will deliver special gifts to your significant other—wherever they are. Depending on where your romantic partner lives, you’ll have to look into places on Google that deliver to their city, state, or country. Then, you can try one of these ideas to send a heartwarming package to your S.O.’s doorstep: [13] X Research source A boxed bouquet of preserved roses (or another flower) from a florist with delivery services. A care package that’s custom curated by you and delivered through an online gifting service (although you can also put together a care package and ship it yourself!). A treat assortment of your long-distance love’s favorite treats—from a box of mini cupcakes to a cartoon of delicious cookies. An at-home dinner date made possible by ordering their favorite meal off of DoorDash, Deliveroo, UberEats, or another food delivery service. A gift subscription service of something that they enjoy, like gourmet coffees, international snacks, best-selling novels, or curated bottles of wine.

steps.title: Stay connected during long distance with frequent communication and visits.
steps.content: Stay connected during long distance with frequent communication and visits. It can be difficult to feel close to someone who’s physically far away, but there are many things you can do to make your long-distance relationship stronger—and to make it last across all the miles! Here are some top tips for staying connected to your partner during your time apart: [14] X Research source Talk frequently: Have regular text, phone, and video conversations with your partner—talking face-to-face at least once per day is a good goal. Communicate deeply and mindfully: Don’t stick to the superficial stuff during your conversations. Be open about your feelings and listen intently to your partner. Communicate quickly and clearly about any potential misunderstanding (which can come up a lot in texting!). Use technology: Take advantage of modern technology like dual movie-streaming services, shared playlists, online multiplayer games, and even shared touch technology like the Bond Touch bracelets and necklaces (that allow you to touch your partner wherever they are!). Start a shared project or hobby: Learn a language together, join a virtual book club, practice new food or drink recipes while on video chat, or take an online drawing class together. Plan visits: As much as possible, always have your next visit planned and trade off who is visiting whom. Avoid putting too much pressure on these visits—let them develop however they do naturally. Set shared goals: Discuss your aspirations and work together toward building a future together (where you’ll both be living in the same place).
